Name: PM_leaf
Synonyms: Powdery Mildew Leaf; Powdery Mildew Severity Leaf
Description: Powdery mildew (PM) due to Erysiphe necator severity in field, leaves only
Trait lists: Nursery evaluation; Greenhouse evaluation; Trial evaluation
Scale categories: 1=No visible infection; 2=Very few, small colonies; 3=< 50% coverage; 4=>50% coverage
